events.message: The applicant has successfully submitted the mortgage loan application for their new house purchase.
The loan application has been categorised under Mortgage Loan based on the property and home-related keywords mentioned.
A dedicated loan officer has been assigned to the applicant to guide them through the mortgage process.
The initial review of the applicant's submitted documents and application details is underway.
Additional documents including proof of income and property appraisal were requested from the applicant.
The applicant has submitted all requested documents promptly including income proof and property evaluation reports.
Credit check for the applicant has been completed showing a strong credit score and good repayment history.
The risk assessment concluded moderate risk based on loan amount and applicant financial stability.
A mortgage loan offer outlining terms, interest rates, and repayment schedule has been presented to the applicant.
Applicant has responded with some queries and requested slight adjustments in the repayment tenure options.
The application was escalated to senior management to consider the requested repayment tenure changes.
Senior management has approved the mortgage loan application with amended repayment terms as requested.
The mortgage loan funds have been successfully disbursed to the applicantâ€™s designated account for property purchase.
Follow-up communication was made to ensure the applicant is satisfied with the loan and payment plan arrangements.
The mortgage loan application process is now closed after successful funding and follow-up confirmation.
